author: kevan
msg: Re-commit of commits 2651-2655 which were lost when codehaus server crashed. Commit messages follow...
Slightly related to GERONIMO-1863.  Use dependencies instead of references to assure gbean start order, now that we have dependencies
Fixed AuthRequestHandler to handle no security credentials

author: hogstrom
msg: PERF: Updated SerializationHandler and EJBMethodInterceptor to improve Object Copying Performance.  Also enabled the ability to disable pass-by-value semantics by specifying -Dopenejb.localcopy=[true|false].  Copying is on by default

author: dblevins
msg: Changed the groupId of the patched xstream jar to our legacy location

author: jlaskowski
msg: Upgrade XBean to 2.3 (and let the build go on)
